data.title: History
data.meta_description: We’ve spent over a decade building up to the company we are today. Here are some of our major growth milestones.
data.text:
Integration Partners

With the addition of Integration Partners, an award-winning team that designs and implements collaboration and digital infrastructure solutions, C1 expands its presence in New England and the Midwest.

Prime TSR

With the addition of Prime TSR, a leading modernization and cloud solutions consultancy, C1 enhances its ability to deliver innovative solutions that solve complex IT business challenges by expanding its customer modernization capabilities in the cloud.

WrightCore

With the addition of WrightCore, an industry-leading technology solution provider, C1 strengthens its position as a leader in supporting customers on their cloud modernization journeys by expanding its cloud, managed, and professional services capabilities.

NuAge Experts

With the addition of NuAge Experts, a premier Salesforce services provider, C1 increases its ability to accelerate customers' business and support the modernization of their total customer experience.

AAA Network Solutions Inc.

With the addition of AAA Network Solutions Inc., a premier public sector service provider, C1 further solidifies its position as a progressive solutions leader and expands its capabilities to support education customers.

Altivon

With the addition of Altivon, a premier contact center solutions provider, C1 further solidifies its position as a leading provider of collaboration and IT-enabled solutions in the market today.

Venture Technologies

With the addition of Venture Technologies, C1 expands its southern and western presence and advances its leadership position as a single-source provider of collaboration cloud offers, services, and support.

Advantel Networks

With the addition of Advantel Networks, C1 gains the strategic resources to elevate our role as a leading provider of multivendor collaboration technologies, support, and services. It also expands our Western presence.

AOS

With the acquisition of Alexander Open Systems (AOS) we extend C1’s Midwest footprint and broadens our portfolio of collaboration services and solutions capabilities

RGTS

We acquire Rockefeller Group Technology Solutions (RGTS). This acquisition enables C1 to increase our presence in the northeastern United States and advance our leadership position as a single-source provider of collaboration cloud offerings, services and support.

SPS

SPS joins C1 and solidifies our position in the top tier of collaboration solution providers. SPS broadens our portfolio with a new video conferencing solution and strengthens our Managed Services, Cisco and Microsoft businesses with expanded solutions backed by decades of experience and certified expertise.

Annese

We acquire Annese & Associates, further growing our presence in the Northeast and continuing to expand our Cisco footprint and certifications. This also increases our capabilities in providing consulting, design, installation, maintenance, and cloud and managed services to Education, Government, Healthcare, Commercial, and Financial institutions.

SIGMAnet

With the acquisition of SIGMAnet, we increased our reach in the western United States, as well as the scale of our Cisco solutions. We also expanded our portfolio with complimentary offers from VMware, Dell, HP, IBM, Microsoft and EMC; strengthened our industry solutions for higher education; and bolstered our ability to remotely support customers through their network operations center.

Integration of Acquisitions

C1 integrates all the acquired companies into a single company to deliver a seamless experience for our customers.

Mountain States Networking

At the same time as our Sunturn acquisition, we also acquire Mountain States Networking – a Cisco Gold Certified Partner and a leading network solutions provider in the West.

Sunturn

We acquire Sunturn, an Avaya Platinum Partner that designs and delivers unified communications, collaboration and contact center solutions to mid-market business. The move deepens our mid-market reach and presence in the West and South.

Spanlink

With the acquisition of Spanlink, we add a full suite of Cisco solutions and services. Spanlink also brings the highest certifications in Cisco collaboration architectures and a comprehensive managed services offering.

Launch Advanced Services Delivery Practice

NACR launches an Advanced Services Delivery Practice for the Contact Center. This new practice provides advanced contact center services, cloud and self-service solutions and integration expertise from across C1.

iTrus

We expand expertise in the healthcare vertical with the acquisition of iTrus, a company focused on design, implementation, applications and infrastructure availability.

G3 Technologies

With the acquisition of G3 Technologies, we strengthen our capabilities to design, develop, integrate and manage voice and data solutions. G3 brings broad capabilities across multiple providers.

SimpliCTI

By acquiring SimpliCTI we added unified communications systems integration as well as contact center customer applications development. SimpliCTI also gave us the opportunity to offer our clients high value-added consulting services for contact center customer interactions.

NorthPark Group

We expand our high-end IT consulting and professional services capabilities in acquiring NorthPark Group. NorthPark also brings expertise with global infrastructure deployments for customers in financial services.

Voice Operations Merger

We realign our voice and data businesses – bringing together our voice operations under NACR and our data operations under S1 – to be more sharply focused and effective.

Empire Technologies

In just one month we increase our presence in the Northeast and add a robust maintenance service base, multi-vendor Managed Services and Support centers and proprietary workflow tools as well as a telemarketing center with the purchase of Empire Technologies.

S1 IT Solutions

In buying S1 IT Solutions, we add expertise in IBM solutions and expand our presence in the Northwest.

Combest

With the acquisition of Combest, we add in-house maintenance and managed services. We also significantly expand our presence in Georgia, Florida and Pennsylvania.

Integration Partners

With the addition of Integration Partners, an award-winning team that designs and implements collaboration and digital infrastructure solutions, C1 expands its presence in New England and the Midwest.

Prime TSR

With the addition of Prime TSR, a leading modernization and cloud solutions consultancy, C1 enhances its ability to deliver innovative solutions that solve complex IT business challenges by expanding its customer modernization capabilities in the cloud.

With the addition of WrightCore, an industry-leading technology solution provider, C1 strengthens its position as a leader in supporting customers on their cloud modernization journeys by expanding its cloud, managed, and professional services capabilities.

NACR expands its app development capabilities in beginning to develop custom apps using the Avaya Agile Communication Environment (ACE) Foundation Toolkit.
